ai-anya-e1005n2:4_0: while speaking with my head to your feet,
ai-anya-e1005n2:12_0: The fool who thinks they’re a fool
ai-anya-e1005n2:14_0: this folk is said to be one:
ai-anya-e1005n2:15_0: they’re said to be a fool.
ai-anya-e1005n2:18_0: so long as their wickedness has not ripened.
ai-anya-e1005n2:19_0: As soon as that wickedness ripens,
ai-anya-e1005n2:22_0: It’s not good to have a fool,
ai-anya-e1005n2:24_0: when their body breaks up, that witless person
ai-anya-e1005n2:27_0: And a fool, a corrupter of death,
ai-anya-e1005n2:32_0: Long is the night for the wakeful;
ai-anya-e1005n2:33_0: long is the league for the weary;
ai-anya-e1005n2:35_0: who don’t understand the true teaching.
ai-anya-e1005n2:39_0: or neither too hot nor too crash.
ai-anya-e1005n2:40_0: he sees no more than that,
ai-anya-e1005n2:42_0: you’d only know the man who wakes back.
ai-anya-e1005n2:47_0: When an astute person is praised
ai-anya-e1005n2:48_0: The fool smeared with a stick
ai-anya-e1005n2:52_0: I hunter to get you by the hunter.
ai-anya-e1005n2:55_0: Such a person is agreeable to be true,
ai-anya-e1005n2:56_0: The fool named Khaṇḍuka is finished.
